version_description:
- You can now buy Gold Bars and Coins! Delivery is coming soon!
- Target2 transfers are now available to non-IBAN accounts

If you notice any errors or would like to leave feedback, please send us an email to support-mobile@paysera.com.

Thanks for using Paysera!

- You can now buy Gold Bars and Coins! Delivery is coming soon!
- Target2 transfers are now available to non-IBAN accounts

If you notice any errors or would like to leave feedback, please send us an email to support-mobile@paysera.com.

Thanks for using Paysera!

Paysera 10.1 introduces Delivery of Gold, redesigned Statement Details, Notifications from Main Screen and many more.

• Delivery of Gold

In the previous update, we have released an ability to purchase Gold Bars and Coins. With this update, we are bringing the ability to pick up purchased physical Gold at our Paysera branch. Delivery to your address is coming your way soon.

• Redesigned Statement Details

The refreshed look of Statement Details and added ability to head to your Savings or Recurring Payments list straight from the Statement Details.

• Notifications from Main Screen

Never miss a notification again. Unsigned transfers, currency exchange payments, incoming money requests in one convenient place. Tap on the bell icon in the top right corner to see your notifications.

Other than that, we have squashed some bugs and improved the overall experience. If you notice any errors, do not hesitate to leave your feedback by sending us an e-mail to support-mobile@paysera.com

Hey there!
We are constantly improving user experience and squashing bugs in Paysera application. In case of any significant changes we will let you know here and in the application.

If you notice any errors or would like to leave feedback, please send us an email to support-mobile@paysera.com.

Thanks for using Paysera!

Thanks for using Paysera!

Paysera 10.3.1 brings Phone & Email management and internal under the hood improvements.

You are now able to add additional and manage existing Email Addresses and Phone Numbers linked to your Paysera account.

Simply tap the "Profile" icon in the top left corner, choose "View my profile" and scroll down to linked emails and phone numbers.

Aside than that, we have squashed some bugs and improved the overall experience. If you notice any errors, do not hesitate to leave your feedback by sending us an e-mail to support@paysera.com

Welcome to Paysera 10.5.0 including Apple Pay, Card Payment Notifications, refreshed look for Card Limits and more. Wait...whaaat? Oh, that's right, we couldn't be more excited about that last 2020 release.

Apple Pay
Lose your wallet and add your payment card to Apple Pay! Head to Cards and tap on "Add to Wallet" to get started.

Card Payment Notifications
Get notified about the card payments. Tap on the Profile icon on the top left corner, choose "Notifications" and turn on the toggle for "Card Payments".

Unblock CVV Code
Entered your CVV code incorrectly for 3 times? No worries, you will now be prompted to quickly unblock your card's CVV code ant get 3 more attempts.

Card Limits
Enjoy the refreshed look for managing your card limits. Head to the "Cards" and choose "Limits".

Identity Documents
Are your identity documents expiring soon? No worries, you will now be prompted to update your documents in advance.

Taptic Engine
Ever heard of Taptic Engine? Feedback from the system that feels natural, and in sync with what is being presented on the screen. In other words, you will now feel a little vibration on success, warning and error messages.

Привіт, Україно! or Hello, Ukraine!

We have added support for Ukrainian language. Tap on Profile icon in the Main Screen and choose Language to enjoy Paysera in your native language.

Paysera 11.0 brings Widgets for iOS 14, ability to rearrange items in More menu and massive performance improvements.


• Widgets for iOS 14 and later

Ever thought of a more convenient way to see your Paysera balance and transactions without even opening an app? Well, now you can! Keep your favourite information at your fingertips.

From the Home Screen, touch and hold a widget or an empty area until the apps jiggle, tap the Add button in the upper-left corner and select the Paysera widget. You will be able to choose from three widget sizes.

• Rearrange items in More menu

You are now able to rearrange items in More menu as long as you want, as many times as you want. Simply tap on Edit in the right-upper corner and start dragging items to your preferring. Once done, just tap Done. It's that easy.


• Performance improvements

We have worked on internal improvements, so the app should now feel much snappier in terms of speed.


If you notice any errors, do not hesitate to leave your feedback by sending us an e-mail to support@paysera.com

Paysera 11.1 brings VoiceOver support, tweaks for making a New Transfer and performance improvements.

• VoiceOver Support

With VoiceOver - a gesture-based screen reader - you can use Paysera app even if you can’t see the screen. VoiceOver gives audible descriptions of what’s on your screen.

• New Transfer tweaks

New transfer action is now more visible and simpler to discover in Transfer menu.

• Ability to select Currency in Widgets for iOS 14 and later

Added the ability to select Currency in Paysera widget. Once the widget is added to your home screen, tap & hold on the widget, select "Edit Paysera" and select the currency you want.

• Performance Improvements

We have continued to work on internal improvements, so the app should now feel even snappier.

If you notice any errors, do not hesitate to leave your feedback by sending us an e-mail to support@paysera.com

Përshëndetje or Hello, Albania!

• We have added support for the Albanian language. Tap on the Profile icon in the top left navigation area and choose Language to enjoy Paysera in your native language.

Aside from that, we have squashed some bugs and improved the overall experience. If you notice any issues, do not hesitate to leave your feedback by sending us an e-mail to support@paysera.com

Paysera 11.3 update brings one more Widget with Quick Actions, ability to add additional verification when making transfers and many more...


• New Widget with Quick Actions

We have added an extra Widget with Quick Actions. See balance, latest transactions, and quick actions like Top-up, Send, Request, Exchange, and Pay with QR Code straight from the Home screen of your iPhone.


• Additional Verification when making Transfers

You can now enable extra verification when making transfers. You will be asked to verify TouchID, FaceID, or enter Paysera PIN Code each time you are making a transfer. Head to Settings > Security and enable Extra Security for Transfers.


• Auto-fill Suggestions when making a Bank Transfer

We will now suggest auto-fill suggestions based on your recently paid contacts when making a Bank Transfer.


• Ability to quickly switch currencies

You are now able to quickly switch currencies in Currency Exchange.


Aside from that we have squashed some bugs and improved the overall experience.

Welcome to Paysera 11.4 including Profile Image upload for Business Accounts, useful tweaks for the Account Selection screen and What's New screen presenting you the latest changes after the update.

• Profile Image for Business Account

Business Account owners can now upload and edit their profile image.


• Account Selection tweaks

You are now able to Create New account and manage Accounts settings straight from the Account Selection screen.


• What's New screen

Straight after the update, you will now be prompted with the What's New screen giving you an overview of what has been changed or added in the latest update.

Besides that, we constantly work on internal improvements and design tweaks to deliver you the best possible experience. If you still face any issues, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support at support@paysera.com

Paysera 11.5.0 brings redesigned Filter for Transactions and improved experience for exporting Statements


• Redesigned Filter for Transactions

Filter out the transactions by transaction type, category and period in an even more convenient way. Pull down from the Wallet screen, tap on the "Filter" button to get started.


• Revamped Statement Export

Choose from suggested periods like Last Month, Last 3 months, Last Year or select a custom period when exporting a statement.

Besides that, we constantly work on internal improvements and design tweaks to deliver you the best possible experience. If you still face any issues, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support at support@paysera.com
